I fucking swear... I really want to know how people can remember and explain with great detail their dreams.

How they know the place where they were dreaming? How they know it is that place? How they remember what were doing?

How you know you was in posting in this thread and not in other one? How you know that you wasn't posting in another site? How you know that you was just having a dream about you just writing in a PC?
